mapper.select: SELECT bu.login_name userName, bu.userid subUserId FROM user_group_relation ugr, base_user bu, user_group ug WHERE ugr.group_id = ug.id AND ugr.user_id = bu.userid AND bu.`status` = 1 AND ug.id=#{userGroupId}

SELECT bu.userid,bu.`name`,bu.login_name userName from base_user bu where bu.user_parent=#{loginUserId} and NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM user_group_relation ugr WHERE bu.userid = ugr.user_id AND group_id=#{userGroupId} )
SELECT ug.`name` groupName, ug.id groupId FROM user_group_relation ugr, user_group ug WHERE ugr.group_id = ug.id and ugr.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT ug.id groupId, ug.`name` groupName FROM user_group ug where ug.cread_by=#{loginUserId} and NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM user_group_relation ugr WHERE ug.id = ugr.group_id and ugr.user_id = #{userId})
